interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mirror Flower Nail Clippers Set 2Pcs, No Splash Nail Clippers for Fingernail and Toenail, Medical Grade Stainless Steel, Sharp Stainless Steel Flat/Oblique Nail Clipper, Trimmer Set for Men and Women
Review Date: 2021/06/04
Store: Mirror Flower
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.74 x 0.67 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '742703082661'}
Review Text: This pair of nail clippers definitely have some heft to them compared to regular store-bought clippers. They are solid stainless steel, and built to last. The same colorful design is on the back of each, but the curved blade clippers are a bit darker green than the diagonal blade clippers, making it easy to quickly grab the one I want out of the bathroom drawer or my shaving kit. Boy, are these clippers sharp! I usually use a curved blade for trimming both fingernails and toenails. Where the diagonal blade comes in handy for me is when I have to go after a hangnail. This blade allows me to remove the hangnail with surgical precision. Trying to do the same thing with other blades usually results in part of the hangnail still being left behind to cause me a great deal of pain and aggravation later. This is a fantastic set of fingernail clippers, and well worth the current price of $8.99.
Review Title: Impressively Sharp, Sturdy and Well Made
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Boar Bristle Hair Brush Set With Wide Tooth Tail Comb Natural Soft Hair Brushes For Women Kids Mens Hair Brush For Straightening Styling Smoothing Brush Adds Shine Fine Hair Brush For Men Sonvera {'Brand': 'Sonvera', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Fine, Thick, Thin', 'Material': 'Boar', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 3.23 x 1.89 inches; 5.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '353012722652'} I'm male with relatively short, somewhat thinning hair. The brush works great for me. The bristles are relatively soft and flexible so it doesn't feel like I'm trying to tear my scalp off. Comb is too stiff but I can see where someone else might like it. Now the fun part. I didn't know what that little metal-tined thing (photo 2) was for. I figured it was a mustache comb and I have a mustache so I gave it a try. Worked great! The little tines penetrated the mustache hairs and felt great on the underlying skin. Kinda like an exfoliater! I loved it. Couldn't find a description of it on the product's page so I reviewed a couple of similar products and discovered that it's actually for cleaning the brush. Not for me - I'm using it on my mustache. Nice product and seems to be high quality. Highly recommend. Good for Medium to Short Length Man's Hair Bath Bombs, SAZEN Bath Bomb with Natural & Organic Essential Oils, Shea Coconut Butter for Skin Moisturize, Bubble Spa Bath, Birthday Mothers Day Christmas Handmade Gift Set for Women Kids Her Him SAZEN {'Brand': 'SAZEN', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Package Dimensions': '12.17 x 6.26 x 2.24 inches; 2.65 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SAZEN 01', 'UPC': '745103723622', 'Manufacturer': 'SAZEN'} All around a very nice set, especially for the price. I've paid a lot more for a lot less. The bombs themselves are very nice. Very good aroma and they actually do moisturize as opposed to most others. The ones I've used so far colored the bath water. Not a problem as it didn't cause any "rings" on the tub and I came out with skin the same color as when I went in, minus some dirt. I'll be buying some as Christmas gifts. Recipients will think I spent a lot more that I actually did!. Highly recommended. Nice Set, Great Gift Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} I have some other nail files that are very similar but are a bit stiffer and seem to last longer. After one use I can see wear on these files whereas I can't see it on my other files. And although they have the same grit they don't seem to cut as aggressively. They're good but not the best. Recommended for the price. Good, Not Best Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) KSang {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} Four Pack should last a good long time. I've been using one for a couple of weeks and it doesn't show any signs of wear. The aggressive side is not so aggressive as to tear up the skin - I've had some in the past that did. Ouch! The smooth side is great for a final smoothing. I've included a photo showing the exact size of the pads. One slight negative, and I don't know whose fault it was, but one of the pads arrived broken. Looked like it could have been packaged better. Despite that, highly recommended. Work Great, Nice that They're Two-Sided Tweezers for Eyebrows, MORGLES 5PCS Tweezers for Women Precision Tweezers Set with Eyebrow Brush Leather Case for Eyebrow Ingrown Hair Removal MORGLES {'Package Dimensions': '6.73 x 4.06 x 0.75 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018807', 'Manufacturer': 'MORGLES'} Very nice set of tweezers along with an exceptionally sharp small pair of scissors. The case looks good and is secured by a snap connector. There are individual slide-in holders for each pair of tweezers and the scissors. There isn't a slot for the brush but I just put it in with one of the tweezers. The quality of the tweezers is outstanding. They appear to be very well machined and they passed my "grab a hair" test. What I do is try to grad a single fine hair off of my arm. If the tweezers get it in one try and can hold on to it to pull it out, they pass. Each pair of tweezers passed the test. Another thing I like is that this set doesn't have a bunch of needless junk in it that just takes up room. This set can fit in my shaving kit without taking up extra space. Highly recommend. Passed the "Grab a Hair" Test Pursoma Minerals Hot Tub Bath Treatment, 10.5 oz Pursoma {'Brand': 'Pursoma', 'Scent': 'Ginger', 'Product Benefits': 'Detox,Rejuvenating', 'Unit Count': '10.5 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.82 x 5.67 x 1.93 inches; 10.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8880004', 'UPC': '082045397789', 'Manufacturer': 'Pursoma'} Nasal congestion has been part of my life for the past 40 years or so. Hate to say it but nasal sprays have been the one and only thing that tends to relieve the congestion. Usually once a day before bedtime. Ordered this product to give it a shot. I followed the instructions and added the product (actually two products) to a hot bath and hopped in. Sat soaking for about 15 minutes with no relief. Then I put a muslin washcloth over my face and started pouring hot bath water over it. After about five minutes of deep breathing (in through the nose, out through the mouth) the nasal congestion started breaking up somewhat. Didn't completely break up but got better. Drained the tub (tons of sandy debris left) and took a hot shower to rinse the clay, etc, off. That's when the congestion broke loose. I was able to blow my nose and breath through my nose with very little to no congestion. Unfortunately the relief didn't last all that long, probably about three hours. At 36 bucks a pop, that's 12 dollars per hour for three hours relief. Pass, I can buy a lot of nasal spray for $36. Cleared-Up Nasal Congestion But Only Temporarily Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Rancco {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} The pictures of these "petal balls" on the web page are bigger than the actual balls. I was kind of expecting the opposite. I followed the directions and put one of the balls in a dish and poured boiling water over it. It was kind of fun to watch it re-hydrate but that was about the end of the enjoyment. The "fragrance" given off by these petal balls was akin to a weak tea although I surely wouldn't drink it. As for putting one in a tub, I suspect the "bloom" would clog up the drain and just create a mess. Plus I don't want to take a bath in a pot of tea. I'll have to pass on this one. IMHO Not Fragrant and They're Tiny Pursoma Digital Detox Bath Treatment, 10 oz Pursoma {'Brand': 'Pursoma', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Cleansing', 'Product Benefits': 'Detox,Rejuvenating', 'Material Feature': 'Phthalate Free,Paraben Free,Non GMO', 'Package Dimensions': '8.78 x 5.79 x 1.89 inches; 10 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8880002-AMZ', 'UPC': '082045397765', 'Manufacturer': 'Pursoma'} I've got a bad back and regularly do Epsom salt soaks in very warm to hot water. I usually pay about $5 for a bag of Epsom salt that's good for 4-5 baths. That's about $1 per soak. The Pursoma Digital Detox Bath Soak did about as much to relax me and relief pain as the Epsom salt and with the Epsom salt I don't have to shower to remove the "mud" and rinse out the mud/dirt from the tub after using it. I suspect more of the relaxation comes from the hot water and length of time a person soaks as it does from any additive put in the water. With the Epsom salt baths I can also add in a bath bomb for a couple bucks more and enjoy the aroma and moisturizing effects of the bomb. I'll stick with my routine. Not at $34 a pop Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free PURE NATURE LUX SPA {'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Clean,Gentle', 'Material Type Free': 'Sulfate Free', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 6.06 x 3.19 inches; 2.68 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'UPC': '765066671143'} I got this shampoo and conditioner for my wife--here is her review: I wanted this shampoo and conditioner because it said it worked really well for gray and white hair--as a senior I have plenty of both--and because it got good reviews re fragrance and how soft it left hair. When I was in the shower and squirted some shampoo into my hand, I was amazed to see that the shampoo really is a dark purple color. I asked myself if I could live with it if it actually turned my hair purple, decided I could, and lathered up. The shampoo did an excellent job of creating a strong lather, and my hair felt really clean when I rinsed it out. The shampoo has a soft floral fragrance that is very pleasant. I took a quick look in the mirror to see if my hair was purple, and it wasn't, so I then squirted out some conditioner into my hand. It was purple, too, although thicker and lighter in color than the shampoo. As I rubbed the conditioner into my hair, the wonderful floral scent of the conditioner filled my shower--what a delightful sensory treat! I checked my hair again when I got out of the shower and dried off--still no purple hair, thank goodness. However, when I squirted some shampoo into my hand to take a photo, there was a big purple stain on my hand when I washed the shampoo off. I squirted the conditioner in a different spot on my hand for that photo, and it did the same thing. I've washed my hands several times since then, and the purple stains are still there. So...even though the product information online says it works fine with gray and white hair, I look down at my purple stains on my hand and I have to wonder. Since I love the smell of this shampoo and conditioner and how incredibly soft it leaves my hair, I'm going to continue using it. If it turns my hair purple at some point in the future, I'll do an update and give everyone fair warning. Not Just a Name, The Shampoo and Conditioner Really Are Purple Orange Peel Nature's Cleanse Facial Scrub - by Visage Pure - USDA Organic - Physician Formulated - Research Supported - Natural Exfoliating, Refreshing, Brightening, Skin Tightening Vitamin C Scrub. Cleans the Pores Deeply and Refreshes the Skin Bringing Back Its Glow Visage Pure {'Brand': 'Visage Pure', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,All Skin Types', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'Gluten Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 1.34 inches; 2.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VPCLNOPNCREG60', 'UPC': '850011358108'} The good: The scent - prior to mixing the powder with water, there is strong orange scent, which I like.
The bad: It's a powder that you have to mix prior to use. Directions say to mix it in a bowl or just mix it in your hand prior to use. Well, I went with "hand" option. The first time I got a thick paste that was pretty gritty, which I like, but it left my skin dried out but with a feeling that there was still some residue on it despite having rinsed quite well. Second attempt produced a thinner mixture which was again gritty enough but still left me with the same results.
The surprising: Although I didn't care for this product as a "facial scrub" it did have an interesting side effect: it lightened an age spot that's on me cheekbone area. After the first use I noticed it but didn't really attribute it to the scrub. After the second use if was more pronounced and I can't attribute it to anything other than the scrub. While some may consider the lightening of age spots a good thing, I don't. If I wanted to lighten anything I'd buy a product that claimed that ability. The fact that it had that effect kind of tells me I don't want to use the product anymore. Between the hassle of having to mix the scrub and the effects it had I'll not be using it again. Some products I order but don't end up liking I'll give to other family members but not this one. Not recommended. Some Good, Mostly Bad, A Little Surprising Face Scrub by Disco for Men, Exfoliating and Cleansing, Removes Dead Skin and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces Disco {'Brand': 'Disco', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.81 x 1.81 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694727'} I like a facial scrub that I can actually feel scrubbing and this Disco scrub meets that criteria. In the attached photo you can see the grit contained in the scrub. The directions say to use a amount equal to a penny and my experience says that's enough to do a good job of exfoliating facial skin. The scent to me seemed like a burnt avocado, not particularly pleasant but I'm not using it for the scent and the scent rinses off. I deducted one-star for the price which seems a bit steep to me. My regular scrub costs significantly less and exfoliates as well if not a bit better. Good to try, good as a gift but I probably wouldn't buy again. Good gritty feel Dr. Bessette Naturals Facial Beauty Bars | Doctor Created (Vitamin Papaya) DR. BESSETTE NATURALS {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'DR. BESSETTE NATURALS', 'Scent': 'Papaya', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.21 x 0.59 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '696550915798'} I ordered the Vitamin Papaya facial beauty bar. The online product information says the facial bars typically last 2-3 months with daily use. This is such a tiny, tiny little bar, I can't even remotely imagine it lasting as long as they claim. This little bar measures 2 1/4'" x 1 1/4" x 1/2". It weighs 1.3 oz. The soap comes with a facial sponge that is 2 5/16" in diameter. The soap lathers nicely and cleans my face well. The scent is very pleasant. I do not see myself reordering this little bitty bar of soap, however, when I can buy a full size natural, handmade bar online for the same price from quite a number of different sellers.***Update. I discovered the way to make the soap last as long as claimed is to apply it using the face sponge provided. It only takes a tiny swipe of the soap with the facial sponge to have enough lather to wash my whole face. After using a number of other facial cleaning products after I initially wrote this review, I switched back to this facial bar and realized that, using it with the facial sponge, it leaves my face feeling incredibly smooth and blemish free. I am happily upgrading this little bar to a 5 star. It may be small, but it does an amazing job! Smells Nice, Cleans Well, but Very Tiny Bar--Update Mirror Flower Nail Clippers Set 2Pcs, No Splash Nail Clippers for Fingernail and Toenail, Medical Grade Stainless Steel, Sharp Stainless Steel Flat/Oblique Nail Clipper, Trimmer Set for Men and Women Mirror Flower {'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.74 x 0.67 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '742703082661'} This pair of nail clippers definitely have some heft to them compared to regular store-bought clippers. They are solid stainless steel, and built to last. The same colorful design is on the back of each, but the curved blade clippers are a bit darker green than the diagonal blade clippers, making it easy to quickly grab the one I want out of the bathroom drawer or my shaving kit. Boy, are these clippers sharp! I usually use a curved blade for trimming both fingernails and toenails. Where the diagonal blade comes in handy for me is when I have to go after a hangnail. This blade allows me to remove the hangnail with surgical precision. Trying to do the same thing with other blades usually results in part of the hangnail still being left behind to cause me a great deal of pain and aggravation later. This is a fantastic set of fingernail clippers, and well worth the current price of $8.99. Impressively Sharp, Sturdy and Well Made
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Grooming Preferences:** The user maintains a strong interest in grooming, now encompassing eyebrow care. His comprehensive routine includes hair, nails, feet, and eyebrows, reflecting a keen attention to personal appearance.

- **Hair Care:** Prefers products with soft, flexible bristles suitable for medium to short hair, particularly effective for thinning hair. He has explored hair care products that address brassiness to maintain hair color quality.

- **Foot and Nail Care:** Prioritizes high-quality exfoliating tools and efficient nail care, valuing a balance between effectiveness and gentleness.

- **Eyebrow Care:** Recently added eyebrow grooming, seeking high-quality precision tools for efficiency and performance.

- **Product Quality:** Shows a distinct preference for durable, high-performing grooming and wellness products. He is concerned about durability and packaging while valuing effective performance.

- **Recent Experiences:** Recently tested a facial scrub, appreciating its exfoliating grit but critiquing the scent and high price. He purchased a facial beauty bar, initially skeptical due to its size but recognized its effectiveness for smooth, blemish-free skin.

- **Nail Care Improvement:** Recently acquired a sturdy nail clippers set known for its sharp blades and durable construction, enhancing his nail care routine with precision tools that improve effectiveness in dealing with hangnails.

- **Demographic Insights:** Identifies as male, focused on achieving a neat appearance through an extensive grooming regimen.

- **Overall Impression:** Open to exploring advanced grooming solutions, he increasingly focuses on quality and performance, favoring products that are enjoyable to use and effective, placing practical functionality above scent.
